comments.raw_text:
For release we need to ship Glean for multiple platforms, including Windows and macOS.
We should be able to cross-compile them from a Linux host, as all tooling and libraries should be available on Mozilla infrastructure.

This can be implemented and tested on its own first, without relying on releases.
Once we have releases we probably don't need to run that on each push anymore.
